'''Gyms''' are special areas in Pokéclicker where the player can earn gym badges and unlock new routes by defeating the gym leader in a battle. There are 8 gyms in each region plus the Pokémon League building, which includes the Elite 4 trainers and the champion. ===[[Kanto]] Gyms=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Location !! [[Badges]] !! Leader |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]]|| Boulder || Brock |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]]|| Cascade || Misty |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermillion City]]|| Thunder || Lt. Surge |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Celadon City]]|| Rainbow || Erika |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuchsia City]]|| Soul || Koga |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Saffron City]]|| Marsh || Sabrina |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cinnabar Island]]|| Volcano || Blaine |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Viridian City]]|| Earth || Giovanni |- |[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Kanto]]|| Championship || Lance |}

'''Gyms''' are special areas in Pokéclicker where the player can earn gym badges and unlock new routes by defeating the gym leader in a battle. There are 8 gyms in each region plus the Pokémon League building, which includes the Elite 4 trainers and the champion. ==== [[Kanto]] Gyms ==== *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermillion City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Celadon City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuchsia City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Saffron City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cinnabar Island]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Viridian City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Kanto]]
==== [[Johto]] Gyms ==== *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Violet City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Azalea Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Goldenrod City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Ecruteak City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cianwood City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Olivine City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Mahogany Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Blackthorn City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Johto]]
==== [[Hoenn]] Gyms ==== *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Rustboro City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Dewford Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Mauville City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Lavaridge Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Petalburg City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Fortree City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Mossdeep City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Sootopolis City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Ever Grande City]]

'''Gyms''' are special areas in Pokéclicker where the player can earn gym badges and unlock new routes by defeating the gym leader in a battle. There are 8 gyms in each region plus the Pokémon League building, which includes the Elite 4 trainers and the champion. ==== [[Kanto]] Gyms ==== *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermillion City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Celadon City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuchsia City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Saffron City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cinnabar Island]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Viridian City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Kanto]]
==== [[Johto]] Gyms ==== *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Violet City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Azalea Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Goldenrod City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Ecruteak City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cianwood City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Olivine City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Mahogany Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Blackthorn City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Johto]]
==== [[Hoenn]] Gyms ==== *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Rustboro City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Dewford Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Mauville City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Lavaridge Town]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Petalburg City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Fortree City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Mossdeep City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Sootopolis City]] *[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Ever Grande City]]
==== [[Sinnoh]] Gyms ==== * Oreburgh City * Eterna City * Veilstone City * Pastoria City * Hearthome City * Canalave City * Snowpoint City * Sunyshore City * Pokémon League Sinnoh

'''Gyms''' are special areas in Pokéclicker where the player can earn gym badges and unlock new routes by defeating the gym leader in a battle.
